display_long_description:
Shipwrecked on a stunning yet untamed island, build your escape or your island paradise at your own pace. This is a chill sandbox survival game. You can craft, build, thrive or escape and also invite your friends to join your adventure!

# If you like a laid-back style
You can enjoy the fun of exploring, collecting, crafting tools, farming, cooking, building and decorating your own house.
[media]

# If you like adventures
You need to figure out ways to deal with hunger, thirst, and threats from the wild environment. Explore unknown areas, discover hidden treasures, and experience the joy of adventures in the wilderness.
[media]

# If you like challenges
Challenge your wilderness survival skills. Under extreme conditions, allocate resources reasonably to maintain your own survival and gradually develop and expand until you finally manage to escape successfully.

The game makes full use of the features of VR interaction, such as climbing, archery, rowing, swimming, sailing and building etc. There are many interesting things waiting for you to explore!
[media]

# Join our discord (discord.gg/rU2vg7kcMv) to start the journey!
